Synopsis: Generates an image using the OpenAI API.
Description: The Get-OAIImageGeneration function generates an image using the OpenAI API by sending a POST request to the '/images/generations' endpoint. It allows you to specify various parameters such as the prompt, model, number of generations, quality, response format, size, style, and user.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIImageGeneration -Prompt "Generate a beautiful landscape image"
Generates an image using the default parameters and the specified prompt.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIImageGeneration -Prompt "Generate a cute cat image" -Model "cat-v1" -N 5 -Quality "high" -ResponseFormat "json"
Generates 5 high-quality cat images in JSON format using the specified prompt and model.
